name: Citadel
body:
# Citadel
Welcome to Citadel! Citadel will be a top-down, 2.5D, online multiplayer strategy game.

### Check out the readme under "citadel/Citadel" for features!
For a more in-depth roadmap and updates, check out http:/gamefunkel.tumblr.com/ for the blog tracking development.

### Authors and Contributors
So far, the sole coder is Andrew Goss (@gossfunkel), who is me. 
Zax Skinner is working on artwork, and is the project artist. Currently, the art is mostly placeholder stuff by me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
